What are the treatments for Hailey-Hailey disease ?,"How might Hailey-Hailey disease be treated? There is no specific treatment for Hailey-Hailey disease and management generally focuses on the specific symptoms and severity in each person. Affected people are encouraged to avoid ""triggers"" such as sunburn, sweating, and friction, and to keep the affected areas dry.
